amendment.description: To ensure a response to medical needs arising from mandatory military vaccinations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1448 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1448 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To ensure a response to medical needs arising from mandatory military vaccinations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1448 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1448 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Biden.
